message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $85?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $87.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $86 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll meet you at $88, and that's my final offer.
